settings.title: Who Is Kenetrek?
settings.content:
In 2002, the founder of Kenetrek, Jim Winjum went for a hunt in the Mackenzie Mountains and developed blisters. He vowed to make a boot that would be able to offer more comfort and foot protection for hunters.

Three years later, the Kenetrek boot was launched and today it is one of the top picks for high country mountain hunters. Led by hunters and hikers, Kenetrek designs-builds exceptional hunting and outdoor boots, gaiters, socks and accessories based on what customers need!

settings.title: Why We Love Kenetrek
settings.content: It is not just developing quality footwear for sportsmen that Kenetrek enjoys, it is also testing and improving its own products.

settings.title: Our History With Kenetrek
settings.content: We have carried Kenetrek Boots since partnering with them back in 2017 and we continue to recommend them to all our hunters and serious hikers in-store and online.

settings.html: Kenetrek Boots provide reliability and uncompromising performance. Kenetrek builds their boots “For The Trail Less Traveled™” by punishing every product through a rigorous test phase that they can’t help but enjoy. We know you will find total quality and performance with Kenetrek Boots because they already have.

settings.title: Mountain Boots
settings.content:
The Kenetrek Mountain Boots are very supportive, yet lightweight boots designed for travel in rugged terrain.

These Mountain Boots are standard wear for wilderness sheep hunts, whether the adventure is in Alaska or Kyrgystan.

It is amazing how light in weight the Kenetrek Mountain Boots are, but what will really surprise you is how incredibly comfortable they are!

settings.title: Pac Boots
settings.content:
The Kenetrek Pac Boots are built with the finest materials available. From the quality rubber bottoms, the heavy duty oil-tanned leather uppers, to the quilted liners, all of the materials are the best.

Even the boot laces and the thread the boots are sewn with are of superior quality. The other major difference is the fit of the Kenetrek Pac Boots.

When compared to other brands of traditional Pac Boots, our Pacs are designed with a supportive fit to allow all day walking comfort.

settings.title: Light Hikers
settings.content: The Kenetrek Light Hikers are based on the comfort model of our popular Kenetrek Mountain Boots, our featherweight support system utilizes reinforced K ankle straps to tie the outsoles directly to the fortified uppers.

settings.content: New gear for new adventures this season
